column4: Guys I need some gui for avconv or ffmpeg. I'm not able to handle with ccommand line. :)
a few links recent on omgubuntu eg: http://www.ubuntugeek.com/format-junkie-convert-your-media-files-to-all-the-popular-formats.html
Thats program is fine, but I need to synhronize mp3 and image in flv.
I guess you need some form of movie maker, then something else to convert the output to flv
